title: Sylla strike sees Guinea past depleted Malawi
shortDescription: Guinea left-back Issiaga Sylla scored a first-half goal to steer his side to a 1-0 victory over depleted Malawi in Africa Cup of Nations Group B.

title: Boufal strikes late as Morocco stun Ghana
shortDescription: Morocco's Sofiane Boufal scored seven minutes from time to secure a 1-0 win over Ghana in their opening Group C match at the Africa Cup of Nations.

title: Man Utd sneak past Villa in FA Cup after VAR drama
shortDescription: Manchester United survived an Aston Villa onslaught as Scott McTominay's early strike proved enough to send Ralf Rangnick's team into the fourth round of the FA Cup.

title: Gabon edge past Comoros Islands
shortDescription: Aaron Boupendza's strike from a narrow angle sealed a 1-0 win for Gabon over Africa Cup of Nations debutantes Comoros Islands in their opening Group C clash.

title: Newcastle in talks with Reims for France U20 striker Ekitike
shortDescription: Newcastle open talks with Reims for in-form France U20 striker Hugo Ekitike in their bid to bring in a striker before Saturday's match against relegation rivals Watford.

title: Spurs Women sign Finland midfielder Summanen
